snippet: The new Corvette Stingray’s ambitions are loftier than the previous Corvette, a point underscored by the return of the Stingray name. If Porsche made this car,  it would cost $125,000.  But this is a Chevy with a starting price of $51,995.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of 2014 Corvette Stingray.
lead_paragraph: The new Corvette Stingray’s ambitions are loftier than the previous Corvette, a point underscored by the return of the Stingray name. If Porsche made this car,  it would cost $125,000.  But this is a Chevy with a starting price of $51,995.

headline.main: Stingray Returns With Styling à la Mode
headline.print_headline:
Hot From the Oven, 2 Slices of American Pie: Stingray is back with styling
à la mode, exotic performance
and a friendlier disposition
headline.content_kicker: Behind the Wheel | Chevrolet Corvette Stingray
headline.kicker: Behind the Wheel | Chevrolet Corvette Stingray
